body_html: @vrv omg I've been commenting in regards to the wrong project. my bad. please forgive me as I've been sick for a while and a lot of stuff has been blurring together. What you have added looks like it would work but what I ended up doing was just a simple 2 liner in the https://github.com/carpedm20/attentive-reader-tensorflow project. there is a PR that I made on that project that also kinda addresses this similar issue.
